data.title: Introducing Nightfall, Goodboy Digital’s most ambitious multiplayer Game-as-a-Service

data.text:
Working with the BBC children’s team to conceptualise brand new IP and deliver a thematically positive co-op game was a dream come true, especially in a world where multiplayer often means “defeat your friends”!

Creatively and technically immense, Nightfall hits all devices in web and app forms meaning democratic play for all. We also built the robust and secure scalable server solution able to handle millions of concurrent users.

Not only this, we created a safe space for social play with limited (pre-set) in-game communication, free from any advertising and not a loot box in sight. “Amazing for Everyone” as we say at Goodboy!

We’re thrilled to see Nightfall fully live and the seeds of a community taking root.

Enter the Dream. Defeat Nightmares. Become a Legend.
